article: Mr. and Mrs. Jones don't often go out  in the evening  , but last Saturday, Mrs. Jones  _  to her husband, "There is a good  _  tonight. Can we go and see it?" Mr. Jones was quite  _  about it, so they went and both of them liked the film very much. They came out of  the cinema  at 11 o'clock, got into their  _  and began to drive home. It was quite dark, then Mrs. Jones said to Mr. Jones, "Look! A woman is running along the road very  _  , and a man is running after her. Can you see them?" Mr. Jones said, "Yes, I can." He drove the car slowly near the woman and said to her, "Can we  _  you?" "No, thank you," the woman said, but she didn't stop  running  . "My husband and I always run home after the film, and the  _  one does the cleaning at home."
